Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Pure elegance, beginning with a nose of roses, violets, and dark cherries, followed by tobacco, tea leaves and currants on the mid palate. Beautifully structured, with medium firm tannins lingering on the long finish.

Name: Prairie Rotie
Wine Description: It has aromatics: Dried rose, coriander and earth with hints of toasted vanilla On the palate: Cranberry, dried Bing Cherries, clove all spice with lingering tannins and coffee on the back palate

Name: Château de Haute-Serre Malbec
Wine Description: Very dark color with carmine highlights and a wonderfully complex and powerful bouquet of morello cherry, blackcurrant, and spices. The freshness and fruitiness on the nose carry over beautifully to the palate, which has a long, silky aftertaste.

Name: Rosso di Valtellina
Wine Description: Colour: ruby red. Bouquet: intense, fruit of the forest. Taste: fresh and fruity, harmonic.

Name: Barolo
Wine Description: Intense ruby red color with garnet hues, ample and intense, ethereal, with hints of red fruits accompanied by vanilla, cocoa and spices.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: Aromas of blackberry and blueberry as well as dusty earth and a trace of vanilla bean.

Name: La Mannella Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: Intense of ruby red.Its bouquet reveals a potpourri of wild berries and fruits, combined with a delicate spiciness and delicate vanilla notes. On the palate fruity, tart, with still young tannins and yet with an elegant structure

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Classic aromas of blackberry, cherry, and dry herb notes are wrapped by toasted vanilla and soft, mouth-filling tannins. It’s elegant and supple.

Name: Corazón de Lago
Wine Description: Its color is cherry red with purple trim, high layer, clean and shiny. Its aroma reminds us of red berries, to the own vintage grape, prolonged, persistent. In the mouth it is persistent with the contribution of tannins which gives a certain astringency. Fleshy and powerful.

Name: Vision Shiraz
Wine Description: A soft, round, and very accessible Mediterranean-style wine with balanced acidity and a rich body.

Name: Zinfandel Heritage Vines
Wine Description: Aromas of blueberry and raspberry are framed by notes of white pepper and chocolate. On the palate, an abundance of fresh berry fruit mingle with dollops of creamy oak. The tannins are reﬁned and smooth, giving this wine a long and satisfying ﬁnish.

Name: Hito
Wine Description: It has cherry red colour covered with clear violets around the rim. The nose is very intense and complex. Red fruits of raspberry and strawberry, black ones of blackcurrant, mulberry and blackberry. Elegant fine oak, subtly toasted with notes of black licorice. Fleshy with sweet tannins that give volume, and with a long aftertaste.

Name: Barbaresco
Wine Description: It has bright garnet red , typical of the grape Nebbiolo in purity, a delicate bouquet ranges from ripe berries aromas with dried flowers , with hints of wood and spices , and the proud and elegant taste in its tannins

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: To the eye, deeply ruby in color, while the bouquet charms with scents of red cherry, ripe strawberry, cola and spice. On the palate, flavors recalling black plums and black cherry dance upon its soft mouthfeel. Rounded tannins and a dash of acidity combine to give this wine its clean finish.

Name: Les Tourelles de Longueville Pauillac
Wine Description: A rather fleshy, open, stylish nose here, showing pretty and attractive fruit. An appealing palate showing uncomplicated style, gentle flesh and a nice balance. Rather firm tannins showing just on the finish.

Name: Crozes-Hermitage La Petite Ruche
Wine Description: Colour : Deep purple red. Nose : Red fruits, blackcurrant and raspberry. Mouth : Fresh and round tasting with a finish of stewed fruits all in finess.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of balsamic glazed figs, dried rose petals and a touch of green peppercorns. Smooth and rich on the palate with a persistent finish, this wine is the perfect partner with grilled steak, rack of lamb or roasted duck.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: The color is a deep red ruby ​​with purple reflections. The nose spicy notes mingle with the fruity, in a very intense and elegant scent. In the mouth the tannins are elegant supported by a softness that makes it velvety. The aftertaste is fruity and very persistent.

Name: Etna Rosso
Wine Description: Ruby red with faint purple, typical of this variety which is not very rich in color. Clear hints of red berries, morello cherry and black cherry on the nose. The taste is characterized by its typical balanced tannins and a surprising fullness, flavor and persistence

Name: La Gemella Barbera d’Alba
Wine Description: It Color is deep red Perfume : vinous with a bouquet of berries, in some years the fruit has notes of over-ripeness, the final slight hints of underbrush.

Name: Amador County Zinfandel
Wine Description: With opulent ripe fruit flavors and plenty of tannin and acidity to back them, this is a complete, balanced and appetizing wine. It smells like blackberry with smoky, meaty accents, tastes rich and full of berries, and feels firm and tangy on the palate.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Garnet with a purple edge.Earthy with vibrant aromas of raspberry,strawberry and cherry Cherries, mint and strawberry define the palate followed by soft notes of vanilla. A velvety softness underpins the mouth feel and yet able to age gracefully for several years.

Name: Oratorio Crozes-Hermitage
Wine Description: Very deep purple with dark purple reflections. Immediately very intense, frank and captivating with a powerful base of spicy black fruit followed by smoked and vanilla notes of dark chocolate and mocha, always underlying, a beautiful and frank, almost lemony, minerality. Very tense, a dynamic attack, continuing on a beautiful freshness with lengthy black fruit envelopping the fine tannins. Never exuberant, this wine is of a righteousness and in perfect balance.

Name: A Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Ruby in color, medium in body. Bright cherry and raspberry notes on the nose, with abundant Bing cherry, spice and vanilla flavors on the palate.

Name: Arcanum Il Fauno di Arcanum
Wine Description: A polished, flavorful red, boasting floral, black currant, raspberry and spice flavors. Firm yet harmonious, with the fine aftertaste lingering with fruit, iron, tobacco and tea elements.

Name: Mestizaje Tinto
Wine Description: Miscegenation is the youngest of Mustiguillo wine. It is the fusion of traditional winemaking and the most modern farming techniques.

Name: Les Chais Saint Laurent Chinon 'La Verre en Vignon' Rouge
Chianti
Wine Description: Ruby red, with a typical Chianti nose, smooth, medium-bodied palate, with an attractive lingering finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine flavors of cassis, plum, fresh blackberry, espresso and cocoa are all characteristics of this Cabernet. Once again the Cabernet Franc component adds a hint of red fruit as well as floral and spicy characteristic to the aroma.

Name: Grande Réserve Blaye - Côtes de Bordeaux
Josep Foraster Trepat
Wine Description: Intense cherry, with ruby purple rim, medium-low robe. Bright aromas of red fruits and plums, subtle oak notes and minerality. Delicate and elegant. The wine shows full of expressive, fruit character with a persistent finish.

Name: Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: It has elegant and complex, fruit and spice flavours shift to darker fruits and mellow herbal notes. Perfect with braised and grilled meats, Tuscan cuisine, and rich, savory sauces.

Name: Reserve Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Garnet-ruby in color with dark cherry, earthy, anise, and floral aromas. This wine is juicy with a hint of cherry that lingers on the mid-palate, and a touch of citrus on the edges. The finish has fresh, zesty acidity, with a smooth tannin integration.

Name: Gran Reserva Merlot
Wine Description: Intense aromas of red fruits such as sweet plums, which combine with notes of chocolate and vanilla, A smooth and velvety mouthful, balanced with a long mouthwatering finish.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: This wine is rich, but not overripe, and fruit-forward, but not a bomb, structured, but not tannic.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of ripe strawberry and raspberry, as well as subtle notes of sandalwood and spice. On the palate, it is elegantly structured with abundant red fruit, excellent mid-palate weight and a lingering finish with a hint of fresh earth.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Plum with hints of ruby, this Merlot has aromas of ripe cherry and currant mixed with inklings of allspice and nutmeg. Velvety, sweet tannins pair exceptionally well with the dark fruit, resulting in a rich, sumptuous mouth feel.

Name: Do Ut Des
Wine Description: Intense ruby ​​color. Very ripe and intense on the nose, with prune, licorice, blackberry and flowers. Full bodied, with chewy tannins. and a long, powerful finish that offers lots of toasty oak and ripe fruit.

Name: Bordeaux Supérieur
Wine Description: A beautiful red colour with garnet highlights. An expressive and complex nose, with primary aromas of toast, vanilla and ripe red fruits.After aeration secondary notes of menthol and spice mixed with cedar develop. On the palate, the mouthfeel is rich and silky with elegant tannins. The finish is long, aromatic and delicious, structured and oaky yet always maintaining finesse.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Purplish red color. Aromas of fresh fruits such as plums and strawberries. The oak contributes with delicate vanilla notes. Sweet and gentle entry. Smooth and persistent finish.

Name: Camporenzo Valpolicella Classico Superiore
Wine Description: Ruby red color. On the nose, it displays perfumes of red fruits, such as cherries, as well as hints of hay and spices, and closes on a vanilla note. The flavor echoes the sensations on the nose, whilst maintaining a somewhat traditional, well-defined style. The wine as a whole reveals notable complexity and structure.

Name: Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Aromas of blackberry, purple basil, and cocoa draw you in as the fragrance of roasted almonds emerges. The oak aging is highlighted in this robust blend through hints of molasses, dried blueberry and raspberry.

Name: Classic Malbec
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Veal, Poultry, Game (deer, venison)

Name: Dijon Cuvée Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Tastes of cherries and chocolate is our macho wine. It is elegant with fresh berry flavors, hints of caramel and spice and will mellow and improve with age.

Name: Zweigelt
Wine Description: Deep dark purple color. Aroma rich in black and red berries and notes of dried figs. Maturation in large used oak barrels creates complexity, subtle vanilla and a lovely spiciness. Taste is soft, juicy and full. Medium-bodied and ripe with velvety tannins.

Name: Beaujolais-Villages
Wine Description: Cherry red colour of good intensity. Intense fruity nose (raspberry, cherry, blackberry) combined with spicy notes. Full bodied and round with soft tannins, a long and spicy finish.

Name: Les Illustres Atelier Prestige Coteaux d'Ensérune
Côtes du Rhône Villages Terre D'Argile
Walnut Wash Vineyard Terroir Petite Sirah
Wine Description: Nearly black, an indicator of the underlying depth and concentration. The nose is dark and ripe with tons of earth, spice and cracked black peppercorns. The tannins are substantial, but cleverly camouflaged by the rich,opulent texture and flavors. While it is powerful

Name: Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: This wine displays a magnificent, compelling and inviting nose that is quintessential of Cabernet Sauvignon. Unrestrained wild cherry, currant and mulberry fragrances arise with pronounced notes of cocoa, coriander, and wintergreen. Sublayers of dried herbs, cedar, tobacco leaf and slate provide substantive foundation to the aromatic profile. On the palate a veritable explosion of fresh, ripe, dark berry fruits. Tangy blackberry, juicy black cherry, pomegranate and cranberry are mingled with lovely blueberry and raspberry accents, underscored with kirsch and rhubarb. Integrated nicely with toasty oak, graphite and forest floor. Full bodied and a very silky texture, this wine glides into a long, generous finish resonating with ripe fruit and exotic spice allowing an amazing aging capabilities.

Name: Syrah
Wine Description: This perfumed wine has notes of spicy citrus rind, refined black fruit, violets and lilies. The palate is elegant and restrained with a silky texture balanced by a fresh, natural acidity. The finish is long with supple tannins.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: An appealing, easy-to-love wine, enjoy on its own or with food. Pleasing flavors of blackberry, baked cherries, chocolate,and a hint of vanilla matches perfectly with classic beef Burgundy or a rich pastry turnover.

Name: Dão Tinto
Wine Description: In the aroma, floral notes with jam and chocolate hints, with caramel. Soft in the mouth, round tannins, good freshness, a juicy, light and long red wine.

Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: Layered with rich blackberry, dark cherries and hints of dark, creamy chocolate ganache. The finish lingers on, hanging on your palette while the fruit and spice flavors slowly change and fade.
